resources.string: Geofencing is enabled for this lock. To unlock this door we need to have location permissions.

For extra security, your building manager has requested for location services to be enabled on your device. Don’t worry - your data will never be stored or sent to us, and we only use your location briefly when the app is open.
You are not close enough to the door to unlock it.
No user account found. Make sure you are logged in.
Please activate NFC and press Back to return to the application!
Touch the NFC tile next to the door to unlock
Enter your verification code send to %s
Time until you can request a new code:
Please check your internet connection and try again later.
Please try again in a minute.
Please check if you have entered all digits correctly from the latest invite code we have sent you.
Enter your verification code send via WhatsApp to %s
